Package view

Class MainWindowView

java.lang.Object
view.MainWindowView
public class MainWindowView extends Object
This class defines all the functionalities of building the main window of the application.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize. Initialize the main window, play theme song and set the progressindicator

      Gets presenter.
      Returns:
      the presenter

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(boolean currencyOnline, boolean pastebinOnline)
      Sets status.
      Parameters:
      currencyOnline - the mode of currencyscoop, true if online, otherwise offline
      pastebinOnline - the mode of pastebin, true if online, otherwise offline

    • AddCurrency

      public void AddCurrency()
      Event handler for clicking add currency button.

      public void addCurrencyToListView(String currencyCode, String countryName)
      Add currency to listview.
      Parameters:
      currencyCode - the currency code to add
      countryName - the country name to add

    • rebuildListView

      public void rebuildListView(HashMap<String,String> countries)
      Rebuild listview. Show all the currencies in the given HashMap.
      Parameters:
      countries - the countries

    • handleConvert

      public void handleConvert()
      Event handler for clicking convert button. when user click convert button, application will start to convert currencies between two given currency.

    • displayResult

      public Optional<ButtonType> displayResult(double rate, double result)
      Display the conversion result.
      Parameters:
      rate - the rate
      result - the result
      Returns:
      the result of user choice whether generate pastebin report or not

    • displayPastebin

      public void displayPastebin(String pastebin)
      Display the given pastebin URL.
      Parameters:
      pastebin - the pastebin URL

    • displayCacheHit

      public Optional<ButtonType> displayCacheHit()
      Display cache hit alert window. This alter window will wait for user's response.
      Returns:
      the result of user choice whether use cache or request fresh data

    • handleClear

      public void handleClear()
      Event handler for user choosing clear listview. when user choose clear listview, all the elements showed in the listview will be cleared.

    • handleRemove

      public void handleRemove()
      Event handler for removing a currency in listview. when user choose remove a currency, the currency will be removed from the listview.

    • handleClearCache

      public void handleClearCache()
      Event handler for clearing cache. This will clear all the records in the cache database.

    • handleBGM

      public void handleBGM()
      Event handler for pausing and playing theme song.

    • handleMode

      public void handleMode()
      Event handler for changing light/dark mode.

      Display error message.

      error - the error

      Set progress indicator visible/invisible.
      Parameters:
      isLoading - make progress indicator visible if true, otherwise invisible
